name: Patagonia Baggies Shorts - Infants to Children
description:
For beach-going kiddies. These shorts have an pull-on waist and a drawcord to ensure they stay in place all day.Recycled nylon has DWR (durable water repellency) finish.Elasticized waist with drawstring.Patch pockets hold small treasures.

        Sustainability
